entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 12:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.7°C
Wind: NE 36 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
